results.deck: Known as the granddaddy of the "Quick Time Event", Dragon's Lair is an interactive cartoon that lets players help guide the actions of brave knight Dirk the Daring, as he ventures through the dangerous castle of Singe the Dragon in order to rescue his beloved princess Daphne.
results.name: Dragon's Lair

results.deck: Ascend from a billionaire playboy to a feared superhero in the third-person adventure game tie-in to the 2005 feature film of the same name. It is the only game to be based on The Dark Knight Trilogy.
results.name: Batman Begins

results.deck: The famous soccer game comes back this year with updated teams and players. The control mechanics were modified, featuring heavy use of the skill stick, and upping the tempo of the entire game.
results.name: FIFA Soccer 07

results.deck: NBA Street V3 is the third entry in the popular NBA Street Series. Following in the footsteps of past games in the series, the game allows you to perform over the top dunks and tricks with your favorite NBA players.
results.name: NBA Street V3

results.deck: Serious Sam on the Xbox packs in the first two PC releases along with slick graphical makeover and new multi-player options.
results.name: Serious Sam

results.deck: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 07 is an iteration in the popular EA sports golf series. Starring Tiger himself, the game includes improved visuals over previous games and a large cast of superstar golfers such as Phil Mickelson and Vijay Singh.
results.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 07

results.deck: Crash Bandicoot: The Wrath of Cortex brings the fight to the sixth generation consoles while retaining a lot of the original concepts and ideas of the previously Playstation-focused franchise.
results.name: Crash Bandicoot: The Wrath of Cortex

results.deck: Top-down shooter featuring a variety of witches and wizards aboard flying brooms, firing spells at incoming enemies. Features co-operative play and sold at a budget price in most areas.
results.name: Castle Shikigami 2

results.deck: 187 Ride Or Die is a racing game for the Xbox and Playstation 2 that was published and developed by Ubisoft. It was released in North America on the 23rd of August 2005. The game was released three days after that in Europe.
results.name: 187: Ride or Die

results.deck: Ty the Tasmanian Tiger 2: Bush Rescue expands on the game play of the first game, but features new elements, such as driving sequences, mech battles, and an expanded world. In Ty 2, Ty must fight Boss Cass once again to save the Australian outback.
results.name: Ty the Tasmanian Tiger 2: Bush Rescue

results.deck: Manic 3D action-adventure game based on the Cartoon Network animated series of the same name.
results.name: Ed, Edd n Eddy: The Mis-Edventures

results.deck: A 3D spinoff of the King of Fighters series.
results.name: The King of Fighters: Maximum Impact

results.deck: Kingdom Under Fire takes the action of the Dynasty Warriors franchise and mingles in strategic elements from the RTS genre
results.name: Kingdom Under Fire: The Crusaders

results.deck: Take the role of Wolverine, Iceman and Nightcrawler and use their superpowers through a series of missions.
results.name: X-Men: The Official Game

results.deck: Sport Simulation game based of Judo.  David Douillet was a popular Judoka from France who has won gold medals in the Olympics. That is why the game was named after him.
results.name: David Douillet Judo

results.deck: Play as a large variety of Star Wars characters from the prequel trilogy in this LEGO-meets-Star Wars action game.
results.name: LEGO Star Wars: The Video Game

results.deck: Rise from your grave, eat the brains of the living, build an army of the Undead, and bring an entire city to its knees. Nice job for a day's work.
results.name: Stubbs the Zombie in Rebel Without a Pulse

results.deck: NASCAR 2005 revolutionizes NASCAR video games by adding the National, Craftsman Truck, and Featherlite Modified Series to the game, plus the all new Chase points format in an all new Chase for the Cup Mode.
results.name: NASCAR 2005: Chase for the Cup

results.deck: Tecmo Classic Arcade is a collection of eleven classic Tecmo games.
results.name: Tecmo Classic Arcade

results.deck: Burnout 3: Takedown was first in the series to feature the signature takedown system for combating opponents. Revolutionizing the series, it has been the gameplay model for Burnout games ever since.
results.name: Burnout 3: Takedown

results.deck: Enhanced, Xbox-exclusive retooling of Tron 2.0 with a reworked single player campaign and refocused attention to its multiplayer gameplay.
results.name: TRON 2.0: Killer App

results.deck: Mortal Kombat: Deception is the sixth installment in the violent fighting game franchise, introducing a manual "Combo Breaker" system and online multiplayer while adding a more in-depth Konquest Mode.
results.name: Mortal Kombat: Deception

results.deck: 2 years after the Curien Mansion incident, strange activity has been coming from the city of Venice. The AMS has sent several agents to investigate the strange disappearance of locals there, but are you prepared for what lies ahead of you as one of them?
results.name: The House of the Dead 2

results.deck: Another set of classic Capcom games for the PlayStation 2 and Xbox.
results.name: Capcom Classics Collection: Volume 2

results.deck: Delta Force: Black Hawk Down is a first-person shoooter developed and published by Novalogic, based on the same events portrayed in the novel and film "Black Hawk Down".
results.name: Delta Force: Black Hawk Down

results.deck: WWE Wrestlemania 21 is a fighting game based on 2004 fiction/cast of the WWE. It is also the last of the exclusive WWE Xbox games, being the successor to WWE RAW 2.
results.name: WWE WrestleMania 21

results.deck: The semi-sequel to the 1982 sci-fi horror film.
results.name: The Thing

results.deck: Worms 3D is the first game in the popular Worms series developed by Team17 to feature fully 3-dimensional graphics.
results.name: Worms 3D

results.deck: A third-person hack and slash game featuring Conan the Barbarian only released in Europe.
results.name: Conan

results.deck: Take control of the world's most famous wizard as he enters the school of Hogwarts.
results.name: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

results.deck: King Neptune's crown has been stolen, and all evidence points to Mr. Krabs. Join Spongebob and Patrick on their journey to retrieve the crown and save their beloved friend from execution.
results.name: SpongeBob SquarePants: The Movie

results.deck: A sim-like racer released by Namco in 2003 for the Xbox, Playstation 2, and Gamecube.
results.name: R:Racing Evolution

results.deck: Silent Hill 2: Restless Dreams is an updated version of the original Silent Hill 2 released a month after the original version.
results.name: Silent Hill 2: Restless Dreams

results.deck: A boxing game based on the Rocky movies.  You play as Rocky and try to win the World Championship.  You'll fight against characters from the series as well as a few new ones.  You get to fight Apollo Creed and Clubber Lang.
results.name: Rocky

results.deck: Shrek 2 is a video game based off the film of the same name. Players compete with four characters throughout eleven levels.
results.name: Shrek 2

results.deck: NBA 2K2 brings the NBA 2K series of realistic basketball games to all sixth-generation consoles, updating the roster to the 2001/2002 NBA season while adding a new "Fantasy Mode", where every player in the season is put into the drafting pool.
results.name: NBA 2K2

results.deck: The Incredibles stars a family of people with superpowers who try to conceal them from the outside world for fear of prejudice. Bob Parr has superhuman strength, Dash has super speed, Violet can turn invisible and project force fields and Elastigirl can stretch.
results.name: The Incredibles

results.deck: A pinball game released only on Xbox and PC.
results.name: Pure Pinball

results.deck: The final chapter in the Legacy of Kain series, this game follows the adventures of Kain and Raziel in their struggles to save Nosgoth from an ancient enemy.
results.name: Legacy of Kain: Defiance

results.deck: Based on the 2005 Movie with Johnny Depp.  This game follows Charlie around Wonka's factory, helping solve puzzles, save the other children and work with Oompa-loompa's.
results.name: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory

results.deck: Flatout 2 is a racing game that brings racing and massive destruction to it's players and to the environment as well.
results.name: FlatOut 2

results.deck: Enter the Fist of Fire martial arts tournament and prove you are the greatest fighter on Earth in this Xbox-exclusive fighting game by Dream Factory. It was released in Japan under the name "Kakuto Chojin: Fighting Super Heroes".
results.name: Kakuto Chojin: Back Alley Brutal

results.deck: The Final Fight franchise makes a gritty return as a 3D open-world beat 'em up for sixth-generation consoles.
results.name: Final Fight: Streetwise

results.deck: Project Gotham Racing is the first in Bizarre Creations' successful racing franchise. The game was a spiritual successor to Metropolis Street Racer and focused on driving with style, introducing a Kudos system that scored the player on their skills behind the wheel.
results.name: Project Gotham Racing

results.deck: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation is the first game in a series of point and click adventures based on the hit CBS show.
results.name: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation

results.deck: Three adventurers that have met by chance find the Demon Stone, an ancient prison, just as it breaks before their eyes. The contained evil is unleashed and the wicked spirits of a Githyanki general and a Slaad lord once again threaten the world.
results.name: Forgotten Realms: Demon Stone

results.deck: An offroad racing game.
results.name: Dakar 2: The World's Ultimate Rally

results.deck: A crazy bumper car game from Burger King, consists of five different game modes.
results.name: Big Bumpin'

results.deck: The third game in the Metal Slug series, first released to arcades in 2000 and later ported to many home consoles, PCs, and mobile devices.
results.name: Metal Slug 3

results.deck: kill.switch is a third-person shooter from Namco, released in 2003, popularly known for pioneering the modern third-person cover system.
results.name: kill.switch

results.deck: NHL Rivals was the first and only release of a Microsoft's own hockey series.
results.name: NHL Rivals 2004

results.deck: The sequel to the original Shenmue on the Sega Dreamcast places Ryo Hazuki, hell-bent on avenging his father's death, in China where he will confront new friends and foes alike in a brand new, huge world.
results.name: Shenmue II

results.deck: Dynasty Warriors 3 builds on the foundation of Dynasty Warriors 2's hack-n-slash mechanics, with the player's chosen officer squaring off against thousands of foes.
results.name: Dynasty Warriors 3

results.deck: The Battle for the Kaladi System is about to go underway, three races will fight for the planet`s abudant and rare resources.  An arsenal of upgradeable weapons await you in this multiplayer shooter.
results.name: WarPath

results.deck: Tak 2: The Staff of Dreams is the 2nd game in the popular Tak franchise.
results.name: Tak 2: The Staff of Dreams

results.deck: MotoGP 2 brings the excitement and energy of the fans and media into the game world like never before. MotoGP 2 is the second game in the critically acclaimed MotoGP:Ultimate Racing Technology series.
results.name: MotoGP 2

results.deck: Dungeons and Dragons Heroes is a 1-4 player dungeon crawler based loosely on the D&D franchise. It is backwards compatible with the Xbox 360.
results.name: Dungeons & Dragons: Heroes

results.deck: A trip back in time with some of the greatest wrestlers in history.
results.name: Legends of Wrestling

results.deck: Do whatever you can to win back all of your cars. Explore Los Angeles seamlessly in L.A. Rush. The title was shortened to simply "Rush" on the PSP.
results.name: L. A. Rush

results.deck: In Star Wars: Republic Commando, players take control of Delta Squad, a group of elite clone troopers, and complete the tactical, behind-the-scenes dirty work of the Republic in their fight against the Separatist forces.
results.name: Star Wars: Republic Commando

results.deck: Fallout: Brotherhood of Steel is a top-down hack and slash game set in the post-apocalyptic Fallout universe using a modified version of Snowblind's Baldur's Gate: Dark Alliance engine. Players explore dungeons, complete quests, kill monsters and gather loot in single player or two player cooperative gameplay.
results.name: Fallout: Brotherhood of Steel

results.deck: In this party game, players traverse a board game representation of five different realms, all which are locations from the film. Players then take turns battling it out in different mini games all in the pursuit of "Precious Drops", the winning factor of the game.
results.name: Shrek Super Party

results.deck: Take control of Tre, a member of a gang called "The Outlawz", who are trying to rise to the top of the criminal underworld.
results.name: Crime Life: Gang Wars

results.deck: ESPN NBA 2K5 is the sixth installment of the NBA 2K series of realistic basketball games, updating the roster to the 2004/2005 NBA season while re-inventing the franchise mode (now known as "The Association").
results.name: ESPN NBA 2K5

results.deck: NASCAR licensed racing with challenges like Beat the Heat and Pro Mode, in addition to the usual Championship season.
results.name: NASCAR Heat 2002

results.deck: Grabbed by the Ghoulies is a video game for Microsoft's Xbox video game system. It was an important chapter in Rare's history because it was the first Rare game to be released with Microsoft Game Studios as a publisher after being bought from Nintendo.
results.name: Grabbed by the Ghoulies

results.deck: Join Tony Hawk and his pro skater team as they try to beat Bam Margera's group of misfits in the over-the-top World Destruction Tour.
results.name: Tony Hawk's Underground 2

results.deck: Shade: Wrath of Angels is a third person adventure game where players took the role of a person who is looking for his brother while fighting various enemies throughout the game.
results.name: Shade: Wrath of Angels

results.deck: Freestyle Snowboarding with customizable characters on real mountains.
results.name: Amped: Freestyle Snowboarding

results.deck: The Incredibles: Rise of the Underminer is a follow-up to THQ's action game starring Disney and Pixar's animated family of superheroes.
results.name: The Incredibles: Rise of the Underminer

results.deck: Once again in the role of theoretical physicist Dr. Gordon Freeman, players join the remnants of the human resistance as they battle the Combine, an occupying force of trans-dimensional alien invaders that have conquered Earth.
results.name: Half-Life 2

results.deck: The first three Silent Scope games on one disc along with an additional game created for consoles.
results.name: Silent Scope Complete

results.deck: The fourth mainline game in the Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six series.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Lockdown

results.deck: Cute but challenging, I-Ninja is a third-person adventure that mixes in all kinds of gameplay.
results.name: I-Ninja

results.deck: 3rd Strike is the final version of Capcom's big fizzle, Street Fighter III, including several new characters and a wealth of gameplay revisions over its predecessor, 2nd Impact.
results.name: Street Fighter III: 3rd Strike

results.deck: BloodRayne 2 is the 2004 multi-platform sequel to the original BloodRayne. Like its 2002 predecessor, BloodRayne 2 is a third person action adventure developed by Terminal Reality.
results.name: BloodRayne 2

results.deck: Run, jump and spin through levels as Sonic and Tails, in order to thwart the plans of the nefarious Dr. Robotnik and free the kidnapped animals! Released by Sega in 1992, Sonic the Hedgehog 2 is often considered one of the greatest platformers of all time.
results.name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2

results.deck: The third installation of Midway Arcade Tresures focuses on the company's driving games.
results.name: Midway Arcade Treasures 3

results.deck: Spider-Man 2 is a sandbox game based on the movie of the same name.
results.name: Spider-Man 2

results.deck: Apex lets the player make their own car company. The player gets to customize their company, choose between concept drawings and race them against licensed vehicles.
results.name: Apex

results.deck: Scooby-Doo must brave his fears and help collect clues for Velma, Scooby can also change customs to give him more abilities, such as kung-fu.
results.name: Scooby-Doo! Unmasked

results.deck: Challenge as your favourite national squad for the World Cup.
results.name: FIFA World Cup: Germany 2006

results.deck: A Wild West-themed first person shooter by Human Head. The main character is El Tejon, former member of a gang called "The Nine" who was betrayed by the gang's leader, and wants revenge.
results.name: Dead Man's Hand

results.deck: A solid step forward for the NHL Franchise, NHL 2004 improved the game's graphics and puck physics.  The Addition of Dynasty mode, selecting when to fight, new Stanley Cup celebrations, made this game one of the most innovative in the series.
results.name: NHL 2004

results.deck: The Urbz is a console-oriented spin-off of the Sims series. Unlike other Sims titles it focuses less on building and furnishing homes and more on social interactions.
results.name: The Urbz: Sims in the City
World War II Combat: Road to Berlin

results.deck: Finding the eccentric Hans Voralberg was just the beginning. Having left her old life behind, Kate Walker follows the Hans on an incredible journey full of peril and wonder in this sequel to Syberia acclaimed game by Benot Sokal.
results.name: Syberia II

results.deck: Play as Nathaniel Hawk as you navigate the dangerous waters of the Caribbean. While the European nations vie for power, you can set out on your own, becoming a freelance corsair, peaceful merchant, or dastardly pirate. Just watch out for the skeleton monkeys.
results.name: Pirates of the Caribbean

results.deck: A game released to coincide with the move of the same name.
results.name: Ice Age 2: The Meltdown
